metaTitle: Rent apartments & houses in Germany – MyHome24App
metaDescription: Find rental apartments and houses all across Germany. Map view, smart filters and comparison – as fast as Zillow, localized for the German market.

hero.title: Modern apartments & houses for rent – tailored to your life
hero.subtitle: Use smart filters, map view and your personal favorites list to find the rental property that fits your daily life, budget and future plans.

highlight.label: Live search
highlight.title: Rental offers in your preferred area
highlight.text: Filter by city, budget, size and features – and compare properties just like on the big portals.

benefits.title: Why search for your rental with MyHome24App?
benefits.intro: Our platform helps you quickly gain an overview of suitable rental offers – with clear information, transparent presentation and features you know from modern real-estate portals.

items.title: Wide range of rental properties
items.text: Discover apartments, houses and commercial spaces in different German cities – sorted by location, price, size and features.

items.title: Transparent pricing & filters
items.text: Use filters for cold rent, total rent, number of rooms, living space, year of construction and more. This way you only see offers that really match your needs.

items.title: Fast contact to the provider
items.text: Send requests directly via the contact form of the listing. Owners and agents receive your message centrally in their profile area.

mapSection.title: Discover rental offers directly on the map
mapSection.text: Move the map, apply filters to your profile and instantly see which apartments and houses are available. Click on a marker to open the full details of the listing.
